name: springz (aguilucho5)
description:
In a distant lunar system, resources are very scarce, so much that you have to fight for them, but what happens when everyone knows where the loot is, and when it arrives?

get on your zprinter to be the first to get pieces and energy to survive, do not let anyone win you, in SPRINGZ only the best gets the best.

Made for Google Indie Games Accelerator 2019

collaborators:
https://itch.io/profile/waluff-1999
